text:
Instructions: You will be assigned one of three clients to help. In this tab, you will find several questions.

1. Drag each tile by its 6 dots into your workspace.

2. Go to your assigned client's tab to learn more about your task.

Once tiles are in your workspace, they will become editable and you can replace the sample text with your own ideas.

Question 1

Interpret and restate the client's end goal in you own words.

{In my own words, the client wants to ....}

Question 2

Describe what is important to consider as you do the first task, keeping the client's end goal in mind.

  • {It will be important to consider ... because ...}
  • {It will be important to consider ... because ...}
  • {It will be important to consider ... because ...}

Question 3

What assumptions will you make to help the client? Why?

  • {I will assume ... because ...}
  • {I will assume ... because ...}
  • {I will assume ... because ...}

Question 4

Use your answers to Question 2 and 3 to help create variable chips that your client will use in their model. You can either create the variable chips in this tile, or create them in the previous tiles next to their information.

Question 5

Describe in words how your variables are related to each other and/or to the eventual solution.
